context: Hi, I am looking for a suggeston for a good romatic comedy.
Hi, I think bridesmaid is pretty cool! Have you seen it? Bridesmaids (2011)
There is also Sixteen Candles (1984) that is endearing
I really liked Sixteen Candles (1984) and Pretty in Pink (1986) was good too.
resp: Yes, I love Pretty in Pink (1986) too!
